sentences.en: Bloody foam around the mouth indicates pulmonary edema.
sentences.cn: 嘴巴周围的血表明了他有肺水肿.

sentences.en: He died from a pulmonary embolism.
I think she's a prime candidate for a pulmonary embolus.
sentences.cn: 我认为她初步的原因是肺部的拴塞物.

sentences.en: It is a rare, but rather benign pulmonary edema.
sentences.cn: 它虽然罕见, 却是个预后不错的疾病.

sentences.en: Left ventricular failure results in distention of the left atrium, engorgement of the pulmonary veins.
sentences.cn: 左心室衰竭导致左心房扩张, 肺静脉充盈.

sentences.en: Literature concerning the diagnosis and management of pulmonary cryptococcosis is also reviewed.
sentences.cn: 我们并且回顾了隐孢球菌感染的诊断及处置的相关回顾.

sentences.en: Maybe pulmonary edema was not in the cards for me after all.
sentences.cn: 也许我根本就不会得肺气肿.

sentences.en: Nitrogen dioxide and ozone may cause pulmonary edema.
sentences.cn: 二氧化炭和臭氧可以引起肺水肿.

sentences.en: Preoperative pulmonary insufficiency represents a critical problem.
sentences.cn: 手术前肺功能不全成为一关键问题.
肺动脉向周围逐渐变细.

sentences.en: Pulmonary aspiration is a dreaded surgical complication.
sentences.cn: 肺吸入是一种可怕的外科并发症.

sentences.en: The lungs should be examined for possible pulmonary edema.
sentences.cn: 应检查肺部,视其是否有肺水肿.

sentences.en: The pulmonary migration of larvae is associated with fever, cough, occasionally hemoptysis.
sentences.cn: 蛔蚴肺部移行,可伴有发热 、 咳嗽 、 偶尔咯血.

sentences.en: This pulmonary thromboembolism is occluding the main pulmonary artery.
sentences.cn: 这个肺血栓栓子使肺动脉主干闭塞.

sentences.en: When pulmonary capillary pressure is markedly elevated, pulmonary edema ensues.
sentences.cn: 当肺毛细血管压力明显升高时, 就出现肺水肿.

phrases.tran_cn: 肺动脉高血压；肺动脉血压过高；肺动脉高压症
肺通气；肺通气量；肺换气

trans.tran_cn: 肺的，肺部的，有肺[肺状器官]的，肺状的，患肺部疾病的，易患肺部疾病的，肺活量
trans.tran_en: relating to the lungs, or having an effect on the lungs
